Method.name: OnPage
Method.Implementation:
#include COMSYS ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------ ; 05-Sep-2012 shobby SR18106: Login image is now configurable. ; 30-Aug-2012 shobby SR18073: Browser title is now configurable. ; 15-Jun-2011 shobby SR17793: Add Hide Logo Spacer switch ; 24-Nov-2010 shobby SR17247: Allow changing the welcome message at a company ; level. ; 03-May-2010 shobby SR17253 (1.7.1) Invalid syntax ; 16-Oct-2009 shobby SR16948: Can't use $job as a subscript to preserve ; URL in CacheTempURL. Passed in to variable on ; the form. ; 02-Dec-2008 FIS SR16205: Simple Login screen for PDA's ; 09-Sep-2008 shobby BR014979: Reverted on-site change to hardcode login ; screen to Portuguese ; 11-Sep-2007 shobby BR014713: If invalid company passed as parameter ; reset to company 0 ; 09-Aug-2007 shobby BR014237: Store the calling URL so that it can be ; used if pressing the X button to return to the ; login screen. Stores the URL and any parameters ; that were passed in (such as YM or LANGUAGE) ; 21-Jun-2007 FIS SR15550: License Allocation Added ; 02-Apr-2007 RPW Refactored usage of $get(^WWW012) ; 15-Feb-2006 shobby BR014393: shobby... Merged changes from Gustavo F ; 02-Nov-2006 shobby BR014210: Store YM in a hidden field in passed as a ; parameter from the URL. ; 31-Oct-2006 GM BR014210: Call ^WWWVAR as first step, before "set YM" ; 18-Oct-2006 shobby BR014234: Allow passing in of language from the URL ; to enable language translation of the welcome. ; 01-Feb-2006 PO SR14047: Keep track of "sessions" ; 24-Oct-2005 shobby SR12338: Code changes for colours and logo pictures as required in Brazil. ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------ new bkgColor,blnSessionLoginOK,ColorCodeForHeaderLeft,ImageDirectory,logoPicture new objWWW012,SPRACHE,strLanguage,strLoginError,strLoop,strURLParameters,YM set blnSessionLoginOK = $$^WWWLicenseAllocation() do ^WWWVAR set blnIsMobile = $$$NO if ($get(%request) '= "") && $find($get(%request.CgiEnvs("HTTP_USER_AGENT")),"Windows CE") { set blnIsMobile = $$$YES } ;-------------------------------------- ; Company ; - If no company nominated or the company doesn't exist, then uses the default zero company. ; - Deprecated since now only zero ;-------------------------------------- set YM = $get(%request.Data("YM",1)) set:YM="" YM = 0 set objWWW012 = $get(^WWW012(0,YM,1)) if (objWWW012="") { set YM = 0 set objWWW012 = $get(^WWW012(0,YM,1)) } set SPRACHE = $get(%request.Data("LANGUAGE",1)) set SPRACHE = "PT" ;-------------------------------------- ; Parameters ;-------------------------------------- set strURLParameters="" set strLoop="" for { set strLoop = $order(%request.Data(strLoop)) quit:strLoop="" if strURLParameters'="" set strURLParameters = strURLParameters_"&" set strURLParameters = strURLParameters_strLoop_"="_%request.Data(strLoop,1) } if strURLParameters'="" set strURLParameters = %request.URL_"?"_strURLParameters ;-------------------------------------- ; Colours ;-------------------------------------- set ColorCodeForHeaderLeft = $$$WWW012ColorCodeForHeaderLeft(objWWW012) set bkgColor = "" set:ColorCodeForHeaderLeft'="" bkgColor = $piece($get(^WWW100(0,"FARBE","EN",ColorCodeForHeaderLeft,1)),"~",1) set:bkgColor="" bkgColor = "darkblue" ;-------------------------------------- set logoPicture = $$$WWW012LogoPicture(objWWW012) set:logoPicture="" logoPicture = "disclinc.gif" set ImageDirectory = $translate($$$WWW012PictureDirectorySystem(objWWW012),"\","/") // New line for service ; %session.Language if SPRACHE="" set SPRACHE = $zconvert($piece(%request.GetCgiEnv("HTTP_ACCEPT_LANGUAGE","EN"),"-",1),"U") set strLoginError = $$$Text("Com00240",,SPRACHE) ;; ;; Login novo - Silmar Rogerio de Olivera - 25/03/2019 ;; write "",! write "",! write "",! write "",! write "" write "" write "" write "" if $$$WWW012BrowserTitle(objWWW012)'="" { ;SR18073 write ""_$$$WWW012BrowserTitle(objWWW012)_"",! ;SR18073 } else { ;SR18073 write "ALPHALINC",! ;SR18073 } ;SR18073 write "",! write "",! &html<

Alpha Lean

Acesso

#($$NomeCliente^WWWLICENSEEncr())#

Desenvolvido por:

Soluções em Logísticas
